title: Sports: Baseball (Usefulness 1-5)
description: Traveler usefulness 1-5/10 phrases for the Baseball subcategory within Sports. Includes 3 card(s).

cards.romaji: Senshu-tachi ga yaky. o shite iru.
cards.japanese: 選手たちが野球をしている。

cards.english: A famous baseball event is the "Koshien", which is a high school baseball tournament held each summer.
cards.romaji: k sei no yaky. taikai dearu ""k shien"" wa y.mei na taikai desu.
cards.japanese: 高校野球大会である「甲子園」は有名な大会です。

cards.english: The baseball players had a wonderful time with the children.
cards.romaji: Yaky. senshu-tachi wa kodomo to subarashii hitotoki o sugoshimashita.
cards.japanese: 野球選手たちは子供と素晴らしいひとときを過ごしました。
